tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sponsorships (
    sponsorship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsor_company_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_start_date DATE,
    contract_end_date DATE,
    sponsorship_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    obligation_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE sponsor_companies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255)
);
CREATE TABLE sponsorship_agreements (
    agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsor_id INT,
    contract_start_date DATE,
    contract_end_date DATE,
    agreed_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    obligations TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sponsor_id) REFERENCES sponsor_companies(id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_terms (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsor_company_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    contract_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sponsor_companies (
    company_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_terms (
    term_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    term_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    contract_value DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE sponsorship_agreements (
  agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sponsor_id INT,
  term_id INT,
  obligation_id INT,
  total_payment DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
